All Classes

Class Description
AddCostOrIncomeFrame
This is the frame of adding income or cost.
AddOrDeleteCategoryFrame
This is the frame of adding or deleting category.
Category
This class represents the object of category.
CostManagerException
This class makes exceptions specifically for this project.
CostOrIncome
This class represents the object of costs or incomes.
CreateDBModel  
CreateJDatePicker
This class create the component of putting a date.
Currency
This enum represent the currency type of the inserted money.
DataForPie
Stores the pie chart data according to the category name.
DerbyDBModel
This is the class for all model method.
DetailsFrame
This is the frame of the details about the incomes, costs And their division by dates.
IModel
This is the interface for all model method.
IView
This interface represent the user interface of the application.
IViewModel
This interface included all of the methods that connect between the model and the view.
Program
This Class Create the model, view and the view model and start the running of the application.
StartFrame
This is the first screen when the user open the app.
View
Represent the user interface of the application.
ViewModel
This Class included all of the methods that connect between the model and the view.
